name: Army Men Defense
description:
Features

Vibrant and Creative Art Designs
Inheriting the essence of Army Men IP: heroes, foes, and atmosphere, all presented in high-quality 3D graphics!

Intuitive and Fun Tower Defending Experience
180 heroes, over 900 tower defense stages, experience the fights and struggles between toy soldiers!

Sandbox Gameplay with a High Degree of Freedom
Command your toy troops, compete against tens of thousands of players, and reign victorious on a vast battlefield!

The toy soldiers await your command!

---------------
Membership Privileges
Queue Expansion: You will get additional queues for building and researching when you activate the Membership.
Daily Supplies: After you activate the Membership, you will receive a large amount of resources daily when you log in.
Purchase
The Membership can be purchased as a single payment or as a long-term subscription.
Membership Valid Period
The Membership will be valid for a month each time you purchase.
Subscription Instruction:
1. Once the purchase is completed, you will be charged on your Apple Store Account.
2. Subscription will be automatically renewed.You can turn off the Automatic Renewal at least 24 hours before the current subscription expires.
3. Your account will be charged automatically within 24 hours before the current subscription expires.
4. You can manage your Subscription and turn off the Automatic Renewal in Account Settings.
5. Terms of use: http://www.apple.com/legal/itunes/appstore/dev/stdeula
6. Privacy policy: http://privacy.volcano-force.com/html/pp/en.html
